Class BTOApplication

Object
BTOApplication
public class BTOApplication extends Object
Represents a BTO application in the system. This class models an application submitted by a user for a specific BTO project. It tracks the application status through its lifecycle, from initial submission to eventual booking or rejection. Each application has a unique identifier and maintains a state machine for valid status transitions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
BTOMS Team

  • Constructor Details

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(String applicationId, User applicant, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType, BTOApplicationStatus status)
      Constructs a BTO application with all attributes specified.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique identifier for the application
      applicant - The user applying for the BTO flat
      project - The BTO project being applied for
      flatType - The type of flat requested (can be null initially)
      status - The current status of the application

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(String applicationId, User applicant, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType, BTOApplicationStatus status, HDBManager handledBy)
      Constructs a BTO application with all attributes specified including handledBy.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique identifier for the application
      applicant - The user applying for the BTO flat
      project - The BTO project being applied for
      flatType - The type of flat requested (can be null initially)
      status - The current status of the application
      handledBy - The HDB Manager handling this application

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(User applicant, BTOProject project)
      Constructs a new pending BTO application without a specified flat type.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The user applying for the BTO flat
      project - The BTO project being applied for

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(User applicant, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType)
      Constructs a new pending BTO application with a specified flat type.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The user applying for the BTO flat
      project - The BTO project being applied for
      flatType - The type of flat requested

  • Method Details

    • generateApplicationId

      private static String generateApplicationId()
      Generates a unique application ID combining the current date and a UUID.
      Returns:
      A unique application identifier

    • getApplicationId

      public String getApplicationId()
      Gets the application ID.
      Returns:
      The application's unique identifier

    • getApplicant

      public User getApplicant()
      Gets the applicant who submitted this application.
      Returns:
      The user who applied

    • getProject

      public BTOProject getProject()
      Gets the BTO project this application is for.
      Returns:
      The BTO project

    • getFlatType

      public FlatType getFlatType()
      Gets the flat type requested in this application.
      Returns:
      The flat type (may be null if not yet selected)

    • getStatus

      public BTOApplicationStatus getStatus()
      Gets the current status of this application.
      Returns:
      The application status

    • getHandledBy

      public HDBManager getHandledBy()
      Gets the HDB Manager currently handling this application.
      Returns:
      The HDB Manager handling the application, or null if none

    • setHandledBy

      public void setHandledBy(HDBManager manager)
      Sets the HDB Manager who is handling this application.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB Manager to assign

    • isBeingHandled

      public boolean isBeingHandled()
      Checks if this application is currently being handled by an HDB Manager.
      Returns:
      true if an HDB Manager is handling this application, false otherwise

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(BTOApplicationStatus status)
      Updates the application status following valid state transitions. Implements a state machine to ensure only valid status changes are allowed.
      Parameters:
      status - The new status to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the status transition is not allowed

    • setFlatType

      public void setFlatType(FlatType flatType)
      Sets the flat type for this application. This is typically done after an application is approved.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to set
